name: jrc-acquis-EN-model
description: Collection of legislative texts (EN) from the European Union generated between years 1958 and 2006

parameters.stopwords: annex application article authority commission community committee common council court directive duty eea eec european goods information joint lay licence member parliament part proposal protocol quantity rate replace republic service states system trade treaty union vessel

dataSource.filter: size_i:[100 TO *] && source_s:jrc && lang_s:en && concepts_t:[* TO *]
